review: I love my chromecast!  Allowed me to end premium cable box on TV in my office nut still watch my favorite shows; will pay fot itself in a few months!
author: Riokoz

review: Doesn't work. I've tried Netflix (worked on 1 of 13 shows I tried), I've tried Hulu: max it worked was for 2 min per episode. Doesn't say it would work on abc, nbc, fox, but just to be clear it doesn't work on any of those either. My internet signal is incredibly strong. I can stream without any issues for viewing on my computer. I wish I could go back in time & decide not to purchase as this has caused more angst than it was worth.I'd love for this to work, but it would need some significant improvements before I would try again
author: JFerr2014

review: Cumbersome setup, had to change settings in my router for my phone to connect. I cheaped out on buying another Apple TV for the bedroom and I got what I paid for.
author: HB

review: Works great, just wish that it would work will all websites.  Table tennis casting from chrome was a bit choppy.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excelent!! The quality is very good!!
